dictionary.title: JLPT N4 (doesn't contain the vocab needed by JLPT N1 and below

meaning.transcription: いっていらっしゃい (いってらっしゃい)

translations.word: (often in response to いってきます) have a good day
to take a lesson or test
calling on someone who is ill

meaning.transcription: コンピュータ/コンピューター

translations.word: not entirely (used in a negative sentence)
not at all (used with a negative verb)
limited express train (faster than an express train)
to change between buses or trains
or a train that stops at every station
